title: How to convert people to worshiping an Eldrith Horror
author: Unknown
pages:
How to convert people
   to worshiping an
    Eldritch Horror
            101





Part 1

Tell them about the
Eldritch Horror









Part 2

Tell them that if they
worship the Eldritch
Horror, it will eat them
last







Part 3

Threaten them with
death if they don't
join








Part 4

Give them a pamphlet










Part 5

Take them to meet the
Eldritch Horror









Part 6

Let the Eldritch
Horror do its thing.









Part 7

...










Part 8

Profit!
